readable.title: 2812590023_50182bc417
readable.content: A Budweiser-sponsored race car accelerates quickly with smoke behind it . A dragster is taking off and leaving a huge trail of smoke behind him . A man is photographing a Budweiser sprint car at a speedway smoking its tires . Red racing car on track blowing smoke Smoke is spewing out of the back of a red race car on a racetrack .
